Trusted.description: Players that you trust to place down codeblocks.

commands.name: /use
commands.description: Use it near a trigger to activate functions.

commands.name: /place
commands.description: Place codeblocks at the location of your ghost brick.

args.name: Codeblock name
args.description: Name of a codeblock you want to place.

args.name: args...
args.description: Args. Amount and type depends on the codeblock.
